description: Indicates an authoritative source for performing value set expansions.

element.comment:
If the designated "authoritative source" (as specified in the valueset-authoritativeSource extension, if present) is unable to provide a valid expansion, this extension indicates the base URL of a FHIR server that is an alternate trusted source where the value set expansion may be obtained.  This may be via a ValueSet $expand operation request (if supported by the server), or via the ValueSet endpoint directly which will return an instance of the ValueSet resource containing a persisted expansion (and the parameters that expansion is based on). 

This extension should only be used if the "authoritative source" (valueset-authoritativeSource extension) does not have a FHIR service which is capable of generating or returning a valid FHIR value set expansion.
element.definition: Indicates an authoritative source for performing value set expansions.

name: trusted-expansion

element.comment:
If the designated "authoritative source" (as specified in the valueset-authoritativeSource extension, if present) is unable to provide a valid expansion, this extension indicates the base URL of a FHIR server that is an alternate trusted source where the value set expansion may be obtained.  This may be via a ValueSet $expand operation request (if supported by the server), or via the ValueSet endpoint directly which will return an instance of the ValueSet resource containing a persisted expansion (and the parameters that expansion is based on). 

This extension should only be used if the "authoritative source" (valueset-authoritativeSource extension) does not have a FHIR service which is capable of generating or returning a valid FHIR value set expansion.

element.comment: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension

element.definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](extensibility.html) for a list).
